comment.author: 19114153@N06
comment._content: Interesting photo grouping. HO4S-3, BuNo138526 had eight days previously been assigned to the Navy Training Center at NAS Memphis. Eight days following this accident it was assigned to Overhaul and Repair at Corpus Christi and on November 14th, transferred to O&R in San Diego. It was repaired and assigned to NAS Whidbey Island in May 1958 and written off there in June 1960. Sold to the civilian market, it was registered as N9708Z.
